alert.note: Alert for Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 5:24PM EDT until August 10 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pike County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Meta to near Shelbiana, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Raccoon around 530 PM EDT. Garden Village around 535 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kimper and Marrowbone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
